text.section: This section does not apply to Hawkins Point Controlled Hazardous Substance Landfill until July 1, 1985.

A generator may not dispose of a controlled hazardous substance unless the generator demonstrates to the satisfaction of the Department that:
Recovery possibilities have been considered; and
The controlled hazardous substance cannot be reasonably treated further to reduce the volume of or the hazard that the controlled hazardous substance poses to the environment.
